relation: There are many activities such as sporting events, concerts and comedians.
The food is decent. There are places on campus that are available for students to eat at when the dining hall is closed.
The dorms are older, but they are clean and are always warm.
The academics are hard, but there are many opportunities to receive extra help. No one should ever be lost.
Visit the campus before you apply. Many do not appreciate the small campus, while others fall in love with it.

Husson University is a small, beautiful, and welcoming place for further education. It offers majors that are not available at other local colleges, such as Pre-Pharmacy. The small classroom atmosphere allows for individual attention.
pageTitle: Husson University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 05/20/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 29 Rachel from Anson, ME Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck We all know college is expensive however, for the education you receive at Husson and the financial aid packages that are available, you won't be disappointed. Am enjoying being here Husson is a wonderful place. Considering its small size, campus feels like a mini community. Also, you never have to worry about finding something to do. The student activities coordinator at Husson works very hard to put on fun and exciting events, you always have the option of joining a fraternity or sorority, sports teams, a variety of clubs, intramurals, etc. Am learning a lot Husson University, regardless of one's major, strives to graduate holistic individuals. The team of faculty, staff, and adjuncts work together to prepare competent individuals in all aspects of their life, not just their academics. This University also provides outstanding hands-on learning experiences. Having participated in such opportunities, it is my belief that I am receiving an education that far surpasses that of a college graduate from another University. When I have entered my field to gain experience I do not feel overwhelmed, rather, I feel confident that I am right where I need to be with my education. Login to
